title: CliMond climate data
description:
Global current and future climate data
Geographic extent: Global
Year range: 1961-1990, 2030, 2050, 2070, 2090, 2100
Resolution: 10 arcmin (~20 km)
Data layers: B01-35
attribution: Kriticos, D.J., B.L. Webber, A. Leriche, N. Ota, I. Macadam, J. Bathols & J.K. Scott.  2012.  CliMond: global high-resolution historical and future scenario climate surfaces for bioclimatic modelling.  Methods in Ecology & Evolution, 3(1), 53 - 64.
